column4: have there been any package updates in natty since the release?
release was, what, 6 weeks ago?  you're not seriously thinking there were no updates so far, were you?
I haven't received any via apt-get update && apt-get dist-upgrade in a couple of weeks
dist-upgrade doesn't contain upgrade in ubuntu?
no idea, haven't been using apt for quite some time..  other than that, dist-upgrade is for just that, upgrading to a newer distro version, not for updating packages
